task.title: Migrating an object to another collection
task.shortdesc: Migrating the object to another location will remove the object from the original collection (where you created or uploaded it) and move it to a new location that you specify.

step.cmd: Hover over the Share tab and click on Migrate to another collection.
Add the name of the new collection you would like to migrate this object to.

step.info: Be careful migrating objects to another collection! If you migrate the object to collection that you cannot see or edit in you will lose access to your object.
